segment: In_a_typical_procedure_,_zinc acetate dihydrate_and_cobalt (II) acetate tetrahydrate_with_a_Zn_/_Co_molar ratio_of_1:2_were_added_to_a_ball mill_.

PbI2_(_Sigma Aldrich_,_99_%_)_and_methyl ammonium iodide_(_MAI_)_(_Wako Chem_._,_98_%_)_were_dissolved_in_anhydrous N,N-dimethylformamide_(_Wako chem._,_99.5_%_)_(_400_mg ml-1_)_and_anhydrous 2-propanol_(_Wako chem._)_(_50_mg ml-1_)_,_respectively_.
Then_,_the_electrical wire explosion_(_NTi-mini P_,_Nano Tech_,_Korea_)_was_conducted_at_a_feeding distance_of_40_mm_and_a_charge_voltage_of_320_V_in_the_Si_nanoparticles-dispersed suspension_.
Niobium chloride_(_NbCl5_)_and_iron nitrate_(_Fe(NO3)3*9H2O_)_,_were_used_as_starting_materials_and_citric acid_and_ethylene glycol_as_chelating agent_and_reaction medium_,_respectively_.
